description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for using MongoDB Atlas as a vector store when creating a knowledge base.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for a Reason attribute for predicted items generated by User-Personalization-v2.
[``botocore``] Updated CreateMembers API request with limits.
[``botocore``] Fixes ListContacts and ListImportJobs APIs to use POST instead of GET.
